thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Maxcom Signs Framework Agreement With Meizu Telecom Company

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Maxcom Signs Framework Agreement With Meizu Telecom Company

organizations.name: brief-maxcom signs framework agreement with meizu telecom company

text:
March 7 (Reuters) - MAXCOM SA:
* SAID ON TUESDAY THE COMPANY SIGNED A FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT WITH MEIZU TELECOM COMPANY LIMITED FOR DISTRIBUTION OF MEIZU’S PRODUCTS IN POLISH MARKET
* ESTIMATED TOTAL VALUE OF BENEFITS RESULTING FROM THE AGREEMENT OVER A PERIOD OF 12 MONTHS MAY EXCEED 30% OF THE COMPANY’S CAPITAL
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
